executable.title: Cast Scalar Volume
executable.description: Cast a volume to a given data type.\nUse at your own risk when casting an input volume into a lower precision type!\nAllows casting to the same type as the input volume.
executable.contributor: Nicole Aucoin (SPL, BWH), Ron Kikinis (SPL, BWH)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

image.name: InputVolume
image.label: Input Volume
image.description: Input volume, the volume to cast.

image.name: OutputVolume
image.label: Output Volume
image.description: Output volume, cast to the new type.

string-enumeration.name: Type
string-enumeration.label: Output Type
string-enumeration.description: Scalar data type for the new output volume.
